name: Doki Doki Nightmare
storyline: Every choice you make has a consequence, whether good or bad. On the one hand, it could be the best thing that ever happened to you in your life, but what if not? Made by a modification challenge, this mod was created in just 9 hours. Are you ready for a nightmare?
summary:
What seemed like just another normal day at the Literature Club soon turns into an endless nightmare. In Doki Doki Nightmare, you'll be forced to face terrifying distortions of reality, where nothing is as it seems and every choice can lead you even deeper into an abyss of madness.

This mod delves into the psychology of psychological horror, featuring new artwork, unsettling soundtracks and a suspense-filled storyline. The club you know and love is falling apart, and it's up to you to uncover the dark secrets before it's too late.
